question: Which of the following oil companies recently was making news for its abandonment of the proposed drilling in the Great Australian Bight ?
explanation: Norwegian oil company Equinor was granted environmental approval by the national offshore petroleum regulator but the company has recently decided to scrap its proposed drilling in the Great Australian Bight. Great Australian Bight is said to be one of the most unspoiled marine environments in the world. Green groups have sought for decades to protect it, but the Australian government has been open to extracting the possible oil riches there.
